units.name: Bulwark
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets — medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

player.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.

units.name: Lens
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (≤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets — medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
